00042    For the development board which uses "USE_HT32XXXXXX_DVB":
00043    The example requires external components on the expansion board but the development board can not use

00047 #if defined(USE_HT32F52352_SK)

00052   #define HTCFG_I2C_SCL_GPION                     0
00053

00055   #define HTCFG_I2S_SDO_GPION                     12

00197 #define HTCFG_I2C_PORT                            STRCAT2(HT_, HTCFG_I2C_IPN)
00198 #define HTCFG_I2C_IRQn                            STRCAT2(HTCFG_I2C_IPN, _IRQn)
00199 #define HTCFG_I2C_IRQHandler                      STRCAT2(HTCFG_I2C_IPN, _IRQHandler)
00200 
00201 #define HTCFG_I2C_SDA_GPIO_ID                     STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2C_SDA_GPIOX)
00202 #define HTCFG_I2C_SDA_AFIO_PIN                    STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2C_SDA_GPION)
00203 #define HTCFG_I2C_SCL_GPIO_ID                     STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2C_SCL_GPIOX)
00204 #define HTCFG_I2C_SCL_AFIO_PIN                    STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2C_SCL_GPION)
00205 
00206 #define HTCFG_I2S_SDO_GPIO_ID                     STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2S_SDO_GPIOX)
00207 #define HTCFG_I2S_SDO_AFIO_PIN                    STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2S_SDO_GPION)
00208 #define HTCFG_I2S_SDI_GPIO_ID                     STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2S_SDI_GPIOX)
00209 #define HTCFG_I2S_SDI_AFIO_PIN                    STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2S_SDI_GPION)
00210 #define HTCFG_I2S_MCLK_GPIO_ID                    STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2S_MCLK_GPIOX)
00211 #define HTCFG_I2S_MCLK_AFIO_PIN                   STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2S_MCLK_GPION)
00212 #define HTCFG_I2S_BCLK_GPIO_ID                    STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2S_BCLK_GPIOX)
00213 #define HTCFG_I2S_BCLK_AFIO_PIN                   STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2S_BCLK_GPION)
00214 #define HTCFG_I2S_WS_GPIO_ID                      STRCAT2(GPIO_P,    HTCFG_I2S_WS_GPIOX)
00215 #define HTCFG_I2S_WS_AFIO_PIN                     STRCAT2(AFIO_PIN_, HTCFG_I2S_WS_GPION)
